title: Logged In -> Paid User
custom_preconds: Log in to the app as a paid user and then exit the app before starting this test case
custom_steps: 1. Launch the app, having previously logged in as a paid user (yearly, monthly, single team or audio account)
custom_expected:
1. App launches and lands on the Home page:
* There are 4 items in the navigation header at the top of the screen
* The 3 items are left-justified
* The MLB logo, **Home** tab & **Games** tab (Coming soon: Clips & Shows )
* One item is right-justified: **Settings**
* Focus is in the **Home** tab

title: Logged In -> Free User
custom_preconds: Log in to the app as a free user and then exit the app before starting this test case
custom_steps: 1. Launch the app, having previously logged in as a free user.
custom_expected:
1. App launches and lands on the Home page:
* There are 5 items in the navigation header at the top of the screen
* The 3 items are left-justified
* The MLB logo, **Home** tab & **Games** tab (Coming soon: Clips & Shows )
* Two items are right-justified: the **Get MLB.TV** button & the **Settings** button.
* Focus is on the Home tab

title: Log In Failure
custom_preconds:
MLB App is installed
User is not logged in
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App and Select **Log In** from the Top Nav.
2. Enter Incorrect Credentials.
3. Verify error message.
4. Enter correct credentials.
custom_expected: User Should be able to log in after receiving a fail log in notification **IF** they've correctly reentered their credentials.

title: Verify HomePage
custom_preconds:
App must be installed.
User must login with valid credentials.
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App.
2. Navigate to the **Home** Page
custom_expected:
User should see white pill background on the **Home** tab in the Top Nav.
User should see the VOD, SVOD and Featured carousel.

title: Verify Settings Page
custom_preconds: User should Login with the valid credentials
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the App
2. Select **Log In** on the Top Nav
3. User should give the correct credentials. (Use a Monthly or Annual account)
4. Navigate to Top Nav and select the **Settings** option
5. Verify the Settings page
custom_expected:
User should see the Top Nav with appropriate tabs visible for entitled users.

User should see the following options on the right side to choose from:
Settings List:
* Log out
* Favorite Team
* Following Team
* Hide Spoilers
* Manage MLB Account
* Terms of Service
* Contact Support
* Build Options: dev, stg, qa, prod (This is an Hidden feature for the testers)

User should see the following text on the left side if the User is Logged in:
• Logged in as:
<User's Email>

title: Log out
custom_preconds: User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App and select **Log In** on the Top Nav
2. User should enter correct credentials. ( Use Monthly or Annual account)
3. Navigate to the Settings Page
4. Verify the Log Out option
custom_expected:
* User should see the Top Nav with appropriate tabs visible for entitled users.
* User should see **Log Out** on the Settings list.
* User should see the following text on the left side if the User is Logged in: • Logged in as: <User's Emailt>
* If user presses LogOut then user should be logged out immediately and see the login button & Get MLB.TV button appear on the Top Nav.

title: Favorite Team
custom_preconds: User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App and select **Log In** on the Top Nav
2. User should enter correct credentials. ( Use Monthly or Annual account)
3. Navigate to the Settings Page
4. User clicks on "Favorite Teams" option.
custom_expected:
User lands on Favorite Team Page
* The title of the page, **FAVORITE TEAM**, is centered at the top of the page
* The **American League** and **National League** columns contain 3 columns: **EAST**, **CENTRAL**, and **WEST**
* Each of the division columns displays a team tile for the 5 teams in that division
* A team tile consists of the team logo with the team name below the logo; both the logo and the name are centered within the tile
* The team tiles for each division are arranged alphabetically from top to bottom
* A **Done** button is displayed below the center column

IF a favorite team is selected, that team tile will display a gold star in the top left corner.

title: Following Teams
custom_preconds: User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App and select Log In on the Top Nav
2. User should enter correct credentials. ( Use Monthly or Annual account)
3. Navigate to the Settings Page
4. User clicks on "Following Teams" option.
custom_expected:
User lands on Following Team Page
* The title of the page, **FOLLOWING TEAM**, is centered at the top of the page
* The **American League** and **National League** columns contain 3 columns: **EAST**, **CENTRAL**, and **WEST**
* Each of the division columns displays a team tile for the 5 teams in that division
* A team tile consists of the team logo with the team name below the logo; both the logo and the name are centered within the tile
* The team tiles for each division are arranged alphabetically from top to bottom
* A **Done** button is displayed below the center column

IF a favorite team is selected, that team tile will display a gold star in the top left corner.
If following teams are selected, they will display silver stars in the top left corner of their team tile.

title: Hide Spoilers
custom_preconds: User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App and select Log In on the Top Nav
2. User should enter correct credentials. ( Use Monthly or Annual account)
3. Navigate to the Settings Page
4. User clicks on Hide Scores to toggle between ON and OFF.
custom_expected:
On the left side, user should see the text "Hide score for live and archived games and any content that may contain spoilers."
* IF the option is set to 'Off', the user should see all game details on the game tile and carousels throughout  the app.
* IF the option is set to 'On', the user should NOT see any game details such as score, pitcher info, batter info, base positions or innings info throughout the app.

title: Manage MLB Account
custom_preconds: User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App and select Log In on the Top Nav
2. User should enter correct credentials. ( Use Monthly or Annual account)
3. Navigate to the Settings Page
4. User selects "Manage MLB Account" option
custom_expected:
On the left side, user should see the text
"To access MLB.TV, you must visit MLB.com/ps4 to: 
**Buy MLB.TV** 
To watch every out of market game LIVE or on demand. 
**OR** 
**Create an account** 
To access the Free MLB Game of the Day"

When the "Manage MLB Account" option is selected the user should land on the Subscription Page where users can select their level of entitlement ( **Free**, **Yearly/Monthly**, or **Single Team**)

title: Terms of Service
custom_preconds: User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App and select Log In on the Top Nav
2. User should enter correct credentials. ( Use Monthly or Annual account)
3. Navigate to the Settings Page
4. Navigate to the "Terms of Service" option
custom_expected:
On the left side, user should see the text:
"For Terms of Service, please visit mlb.com/tou."

" For Privacy Policy, please visit mlb.com/privacy."
This option will not have a click action.

title: Contact Support
custom_preconds: User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App and select Log In on the Top Nav
2. User should enter correct credentials. ( Use Monthly or Annual account)
3. Navigate to the Settings Page
4. Navigate to the "Contact Support" option
custom_expected:
On the left side, user should see the text:
"Have questions? For in-game support, please visit us on the web at MLB.TV/SUPPORT"
This option will not have a click action.

title: Not Logged In
custom_preconds: Log out of app if you're previously logged in
custom_steps: 1. Launch the app without logging in
custom_expected:
App launches and lands on the Home page:

* There are 6 items in the navigation header at the top of the screen
* The three items are left-justified
* The MLB logo, **Home** tab & **Games** tab (Coming soon: **Clips** & **Shows** )
* The three items are right-justified
* The **Log In** button, the **Get MLB.TV** button & the **Settings** button
* The Focus should be on the **Home** tab

title: Verify HomePage
custom_preconds:
App must be installed.
User must logout before starting this test.
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App.
2. Navigate to the **Home** Page
custom_expected:
User should see white pill background on the **Home** tab in the Top Nav.
User should see the VOD, SVOD and Featured carousel.

title: Login Failure from Modal
custom_preconds:
App must be installed
User be be logged out or log out before running this test case
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App Unauthenticated.
2. Select a game tile from game carousel or Games Page.
3. Select the Login Option from the modal
4. Enter Invalid credentials 
5. Verify Login Failure message
custom_expected:
1. User should land on the HomePage
2. A Modal should  popup with three options: **Get MLB.TV** **Login** **Cancel**
3. User lands on the Login Page
4. User gets an error message 
5. Error message should say: "The email address or password was incorrect. Please verify your login credentials and try again"

title: Login from Modal
custom_preconds:
App must be installed
Log out before running this test case
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App Unauthenticated.
2. Select a game tile from game carousel or Games Page.
3. Select the Login Option from the modal
4. Enter Valid credentials 
5. Verify Successful Login
custom_expected:
1. User should land on the HomePage
2. A Modal should  popup with three options: **Get MLB.TV**, **Login**, **Cancel**
3. User lands on the Login Page
4. User lands on Home Page
5. Verify Log In button has disappeared from the Top Nav.

title: Verify Settings Page
custom_preconds: User should log out before running this test
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Settings option
3. Verify the Settings page
custom_expected:
User should see the Top Nav with appropriate tabs visible for Unauthenticated users.

User should see the following options on the right side to choose from:
Settings List:
* Log in
* Favorite Team
* Following Team
* Hide Spoilers
* Create MLB Account
* Terms of Service
* Contact Support
* Build Options: dev, stg, qa, prod (This is an Hidden feature for the testers)

User should see the following text on the left side if the User is Not Logged in:
"Login with an MLB account to watch the MLB.TV Free Game of the Day. MLB.TV subscribers login to watch every game live or on demand."

title: Log In
custom_preconds: User should Log out before running this test case
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App Unauthenticated 
2. Navigate to the Settings Page
3. Verify the Log In option
custom_expected:
* User should see the Top Nav with appropriate tabs visible for Unauthenticated users.
* User should see **Log In** on the Settings list.
* User should see the following text on the left side if the User is Not Logged in: 
"Login with an MLB account to watch the MLB.TV Free Game of the Day. MLB.TV Subscribers log in to watch every game LIVE or on-demand."
* If user presses **Log In** then the user should land on the Log In Page where they can enter their credentials.
